name: Minute to Win It
overview: In Minute to Win It you will have to tackle unique challenges as you compete to win 1 million dollars in NBC's hit game show. You will get encouragement from all-American chef and host Guy Fieri as you compete in a series of simple yet intimidating games that can lead you to a 1 million dollar prize. The everyday household items used in each challenge may seem harmless, but it will take nerves of steel to conquer all the tasks. You must stay calm and cool, because you have only a minute to win it--once that minute goes, so does your chance at winning the big prize. You must conquer 10 tasks to win the 1 million dollar prize.
